11#ifndef RTC_BASE_IFADDRS_CONVERTER_H_
12#define RTC_BASE_IFADDRS_CONVERTER_H_
13
14#if defined(WEBRTC_ANDROID)
15#include "rtc_base/ifaddrs_android.h"
16#else
17#include <ifaddrs.h>
18#endif // WEBRTC_ANDROID
19
20#include "rtc_base/ip_address.h"
21
22namespace rtc {
23
24// This class converts native interface addresses to our internal IPAddress
25// class. Subclasses should override ConvertNativeToIPAttributes to implement
26// the different ways of retrieving IPv6 attributes for various POSIX platforms.
27class IfAddrsConverter {
28 public:
29 IfAddrsConverter();
30 virtual ~IfAddrsConverter();
31 virtual bool ConvertIfAddrsToIPAddress(const struct ifaddrs* interface,
32 InterfaceAddress* ipaddress,
33 IPAddress* mask);
34
35 protected:
36 virtual bool ConvertNativeAttributesToIPAttributes(
37 const struct ifaddrs* interface,
38 int* ip_attributes);
39};
40
41IfAddrsConverter* CreateIfAddrsConverter();
42
43} // namespace rtc
44
45#endif // RTC_BASE_IFADDRS_CONVERTER_H_
46
